category.name: Interface.Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEResolveBypassICForReleaseStatus
preference.preference_description: Bypasses the changes to be tracked in Incremental Change (IC) context during resolve command in Enterprise Bill of Process (EBOP) structures in the Manufacturing application. Valid values are all the release statuses for which IC needs to be turned off. If the value is "No_Status", IC will be turned off for all structures that are not released. If there is no value or an empty value for this preference, IC will be turned on for every release status and for structures with no release status.
